name: Superfeet Trail Blazer Comfort Insoles - Women's
description: High-performance insoles, shaped to fit the proportions of the female foot, for kilometers of comfort on the trails. A combination of EVA foam and carbon heel plates with cushioning pods provides a stable platform and shock absorption to keep your feet going in rough terrain. An odour-control treatment helps keep your boots fresh, even on multi-day adventures.EVA foam cushioning provides stability and pressure distribution for comfort on the trail.Carbon fibre cap supports and stabilizes your feet in rough terrain.Deep heel cup with impact absorbing pod prevents heel slips and cushions against impacts.Wicking top layer has an antimicrobial treatment to prevent stinky boots.Women's specific fit with a slimmer heel cup and anatomical arch length.
